contents.content:
[{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "S.J. has joined the chat group"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Here he is! The future superstar!","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "The guitarist you mentioned before?","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20
"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Hello everyone. I'm Simon.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Hi, I'm KAI, the drummer.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "I'm the lead singer, Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "We've all heard your compositions. They're f***ing awesome!","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "No kidding! I almost want to worship you! Please go out with me! XD","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...You're gonna scare him away","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Haha, it's fine.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "I've also heard your DEMO. I'm quite interested. The lead singer's voice is very nice.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "XD She wrote most of it. I wrote a little bit~","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22
"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Thank you. I did indeed write most of it","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Jesus you guys are making it sound like I'm doing nothing...","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Haha, but I quite like this method of composition. By starting with the main melody, the emotions are very much on point.
For your first song, I made a new chord for it. Give it a listen.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "[S.J. uploads a sound file]","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "OMG!! It's amazing!! Let's make this the final ver~","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Very nice. You can come to our band practice this weekend. Big sis, set up the practice room will you. ","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Why are you grown-a** men calling me big sis? I'm the youngest here!","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "You sure? Simon's only 17","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Thy fair lady here is only 16","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Thy fair lady... you sound like a big sis saying that...","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Stop yapping. I'm done setting up the virtual space in Area 3","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Umm, sorry for bothering, but can we use a physical space for practice? I'm more used to analog resonance.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "I'm ok with it, but I've never used a physical space before","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Me neither~ Won't there be a bunch of problems with feedback and stuff?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "03_N","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Yeah, but I assume that the band will have plenty of opportunities to perform in a physical space in the future. It's best that everyone learned to deal with different situations when they come up.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "You have a point. Looks like we have a new band leader XD
I'll book a practice room. My friend's instrument store has access to physical spaces.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Thank you. Sorry for bothering everyone. 
I look forward to seeing everyone.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "01_OK","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Hahaha get excited! Cherry is quite the eye candy <3","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Shut up you perv...","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:29"}]

[{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "S.J.が入室しました"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "よっ！明日のスター！","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "前に言ってたギター？","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20
"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "どうも。Simonです。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "はじめましてードラムのKA.I.です","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "あたしボーカルのCherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "お前の演奏聞いたけどすっげぇな！","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "まじな！いや、本当すごかった！尊敬する！俺と付き合って下さい！（笑）","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...てめーのせいで引かれるだろーが","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "(笑)大丈夫です。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "デモを聞かせてもらって、俺自身ちょっと興味が湧いてきて。特にボーカルの声がよかったです。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "（笑）全部こいつが書いた曲！一部は俺だけどねー（笑）","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22
"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "ありがとー ま、ほとんどは私が書いた曲だね","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "おいおい なんか俺が何もしてないみたいだろ…","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "(笑)いや、でもこういうメロディから書き始めた曲は結構好きですね。情緒的で。
1曲目のやつに新しいコードを足してみたんですけど、どうですか？","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "[S.J. がサウンドファイルを送信しました]","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "うおおおお！すっげー！！即採用だろこれ","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "いい感じじゃん
週末セッションしようぜ 姉御練習室取っておいてよ","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "おっさんが姉御とかほざくな！あたしが一番若いっつーの","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Simonは17歳だぞ？（笑）","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "あたしはまだ16歳だ 可愛がれ","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "だったらもっと可愛らしい振る舞いを…","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "うっさいわ エリア3のバーチャル空間設定しといたから","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "あの、すいません。練習するならバーチャル空間じゃなくてオフラインでもいいですか？アナログ共鳴の方が慣れてるんで。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "別に構わないけど あたしオフラインのやつあんまやったことないわ","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "俺も分かんねぇなー！フィードバックとか色々問題があるんじゃないのか？","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "03_N","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "はい。でもこれからバンド活動をしていくなら、オフラインライブをやる可能性もありますし、慣れておいた方がいいと思います。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "確かに。おっと？新しいリーダー誕生か？笑 堅苦しい敬語もやめようぜ 練習室は俺がとっておくよ 友達の楽器屋にあったはずだし","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "分かりました。迷惑かけてすいません。
楽しみにしてます。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "01_OK","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "敬語のままだし（笑）
Cherryは美人だぞ～乞うご期待！♡","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "だまれ変態くそじじい","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:29"}]

[{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "[S.J. 已加入聊天群組]"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "出現了! 明日之星!","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "之前提到的吉他手?","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20
"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "你們好，我叫 Simon。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Hi, 我是鼓手KAI.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我是主唱Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我們都聽過你的作品, 太屌了!","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真的! 崇拜到不行阿!! 請跟我交往! XD","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...你別把人家嚇跑","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哈哈，不會啦。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我也聽過你們的DEMO了，我還蠻感興趣的，主唱的聲音很好聽。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "XD 那些都是他寫的喔, 我有寫一點啦~","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22
"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "謝謝 大部分都是我寫的沒錯","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "欸靠講得好像我都沒做事一樣...","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哈哈，不過我還蠻喜歡這種由主旋律起手的寫歌方式，情感很對。
你們第一首，我配了一個新的和弦，聽聽看。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "[S.J. 傳送了一份音軌]","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "喔喔喔!! 太神啦!! 直接定版吧~","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "好聽, 這週末直接約練團吧, 大姐頭你設定一下練團室","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "你們一群大叔叫什麼大姐頭ㄚ?我年紀最小耶!","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "你確定? Simon才17歲喔","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "本小姐才16呢","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "還本小姐咧 聽起來就像大姐頭...","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "少囉唆 第三區間的虛擬空間我設定好了啦","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "那個，不好意思，練團可以用實體空間嗎？我比較習慣聽到類比共鳴。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我是可以 不過實體的我沒怎麼用過耶","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我也沒用過~不是會有feedback什麼的一堆問題嗎?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "03_N","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "是啊，不過我猜樂團以後也很有機會在實體空間表演，大家要會應付這些臨場狀況比較好。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "很有道理, 看樣子新的團長誕生了呢 (笑
練團室我來訂吧 我朋友的樂器行還有在做實體","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "謝謝，不好意思了還麻煩大家。
很期待跟大家見面。","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "01_OK","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哈哈哈 期待吧! Cherry可是正妹一枚喔 <3","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "吵死了 死變態...","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:29"}]

[{"MessageType": 0,"Content": "S.J.님이 대화방에 참여했습니다."},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "드디어! 슈퍼스타가 나타났다!","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "저번에 말했던 기타리스트?","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:20
"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "안녕. Simon이라고 해.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "하이~~ 난 드럼을 맡고 있는 KAI.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "나는 보컬 Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "우리 전부 네 작품 들어봤어! 진짜 쩔던데!","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "내 말이! 찬양하고 경배하라! 너 나랑 결혼하자.","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "...헛소리로 괜히 겁주지 말라고","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:21"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "하하. 괜찮아.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "나도 너희들 DEMO 들어봤는데 정말 끝내주던데? 보컬도 듣기 좋았고.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "ㅋㅋㅋ그거 대부분 걔 혼자서 쓴 거야! 난 그냥 쪼~~끔 참여했고","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22
"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "맞아. 
대부분 내가 쓴 곡들이야. 
고마워.","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "뭐야! 그렇게 말하면 무슨 우리는 아무것도 안 한 줄 알겠다...","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:22"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "하하. 난 이렇게 멜로디대로 자연스럽게 흘러가는 곡을 좋아해. 감정이 더 솔직하게 드러나는 것 같잖아. 내가 첫 번째 곡에 기타 소리를 입혀봤는데, 한 번 들어봐.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "[S.J.님이 음원 파일을 전송했습니다]","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:24"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "우오오!! 이거 미쳤는데!! 이대로 내버리자~","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "진짜 죽인다. 이번 주말에 바로 연습 나올 수 있지? 어이~ 누님~ 바로 연습실 예약 좀 부탁해!","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "나보다 늙은이가 나더러 누님이라니. 내가 여기서 제일 어리다고!","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "확실해? Simon은 17살 밖에 안 됐다고","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "난 16살인데","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "얘 말하는 거 실제로 들어보면 진짜 10대 목소리로는 안느껴질 걸.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:25"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "1절만 해라. 제3구간 가상공간 세팅해 놓을 게.","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "저기, 미안한데. 밴드 연습은 되도록 실제 공간에서 하면 안 될까? 아무래도 실제 악기 소리를 듣는 것이 더 익숙해서...","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "난 상관없어. 그런데 오프라인 연습실은 사용해 본 적이 없는데","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "나도 마찬가지야. 서로 간의 피드백 문제에서 조금 불편하지 않을까?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "03_N","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:27"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "맞아. 하지만 밴드 특성상 분명 실제 오프라인 공간에서도 공연할 기회가 있을 텐데. 그때 같은 상황을 대비해서라도 미리 합을 맞춰 놓는 게 좋을 거라고 생각해.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "맞는 말이군. 이거 뭔가 새로운 리더의 탄생을 예고하는 듯한 느낌인데? ㅋㅋ밴드 연습실은 내가 예약하도록 할게. 내 친구 중에 악기점 하는 친구가 있는데 연습실도 같이 운영하거든.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "고마워. 그리고 괜히 번거롭게 해서 미안. 어서 빨리 너희들과 만났으면 좋겠다.","UserName": "S.J.","Avatar": "xenon_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "01_OK","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "하하하! 아 참! 그리고 우리 Cherry 누님 실물로 보면 꽤 이쁘다고! 기대해도 좋아♡","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 09:28"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "시끄러워. 변태 같은 놈","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 09:29"}]
